content: in this legal case the court has declared the succession of a deceased person and determined the provisions of their will the court has ordered a reduction in the plaintiffs share and granted another party the right to inherit from the estate additionally the court has dissolved a community and awarded ownership of specific properties to different parties the court has also discussed the trial proceedings including the arguments made by the parties and the evidence presented they have determined the value of the estate and calculated the shares of the heirs the court has addressed the reduction of testamentary provisions and the division of the estate as well as the payment of adjustments and interest finally the court has concluded by stating that the costs of the litigation must be compensated the final decision was made on february 12 2013 in teramo dismissing any objections and confirming the opening of the succession on may 30 2007
